sentences.en: Assiduity , responsible, investigative , sociable, open - minded and all - round.
sentences.cn: 勤奋,有责任心,好学,平易近人, 思想开朗, 全面发展.

sentences.en: Earnest and persistent application to an undertaking; steady effort; assiduity .
sentences.cn: 勤奋，用功认真不懈地对待一项任务；勤勉；刻苦。

sentences.en: Good ability to self - study and energy for assiduity.
sentences.cn: 有很强的 自学 能力和刻苦耐劳的精神.

sentences.en: He shows great assiduity in all his work.
sentences.cn: 他对所有工作都兢兢业业.

sentences.en: I admire his bee - like assiduity in his work.
sentences.cn: 我钦佩他在工作中蜜蜂般地勤劳精神.

sentences.en: I vanquished her coldness with my assiduity.
sentences.cn: 我对她关心照顾从而消除了她的冷淡.

sentences.en: Knowlege is gained from assiduity , unwisdom is resulted from sluttery!
sentences.cn: 知识是从刻苦中得来, 无知是从懒惰中美成!

trans.tran_cn: 勤勉，刻苦，（对另一人的）不断关照，殷勤
